page.title: 15LONGDEN SCHOOL (CONT)
page.content: the school has a small playground area and large playing fields. The buildings include four classrooms connected by an activity area, a large hall and a canteen. School meals are cooked on the premises and approximately 50% of the school stay to school lunch. The other 50% bring their own sandwiches. No children go home to lunch. Because of the large catchment area of the school a coach brings children from the Pulverbatch area and a mini-bus brings children from the Hook-a-gate area.
